      • entities

        private java.util.List<Entity> entities
        The collection of entities that are in the world.

      • cannonballs

        private java.util.List<EntityCannonball> cannonballs
        The collection of cannonballs within the world.

      • damagableObjs

        private java.util.List<IDamageable> damagableObjs
        The collection of damageable objects that are in the world. This includes entities and non-entities such as college buildings.

      • worldMap

        public WorldMap worldMap
        The map of the world

        The GameScreen object that the world can use to call functions

    • Method Detail

      • setGameScreen

        public void setGameScreen​(GameScreen gs)
        Set the GameScreen object for the World
        Parameters:
        gs - the GameScreen object

      • update

        public void update​(float delta)
        The logical game function called on each game tick
        Parameters:
        delta - the time between the previous update and this one

      • updateCannonballs

        private void updateCannonballs()
        Find intersections between cannonballs and damageable objects. If such an intersection is found, it will call EntityCannonball.onTouchingDamageable(IDamageable).

      • updateEntities

        private void updateEntities​(float delta)
        Progress the logical step for each entity. Also remove them from the world if flag is set
        Parameters:
        delta - the time elapsed since the last update in seconds

      • clearEntities

        public void clearEntities()
        Removes all entities from the world

      • getEntities

        public java.util.List<Entity> getEntities()
        The list of entities contained within the world. This should NEVER be used to add entities to the world.
        Returns:
        The list of entities in the world

      • getAllDamageable

        public java.util.List<IDamageable> getAllDamageable()
        The list of all damageable entities within the world. This should NEVER be used to add entities to the world.
        Returns:
        The list of damageable entities in the world

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity​(Entity e)
        Adds an entity to the world.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to add

      • getWidth

        public static float getWidth()
        Returns:
        The width of the world in pixels

      • getHeight

        public static float getHeight()
        Returns:
        The height of the world in pixels

      • onCollegeDestroyed

        public void onCollegeDestroyed​(College college)
        Called when a college is destroyed
        Parameters:
        college - The college that was destroyed

      • getRemainingColleges

        public int getRemainingColleges()
        Returns:
        The number of colleges remaining in the world
